ygData.subject: Re: Question about the Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The speed increase I ve seen is roughly 5%-10% over a normal drum.  It also enhances the Rhythm series of songs (percussion) by about 20% (e.g. +38 resist
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 11 Aug 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> I must have missed it earlier but what are the stats on the battle drum? I
> think I remember reading that it increased your speed while playing Selos
> but I haven't seen any other bonuses it confers. What other songs does it
> also improve?

The speed increase I've seen is roughly 5%-10% over a normal
drum. It also enhances the Rhythm series of songs
(percussion) by about 20% (e.g. +38 resist points becomes
+46). I haven't tested it with other percussion songs.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
